short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows students, children, teachers, or any individual with disabilities to enable accessibility of any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReadWriteMadeSimple

It improves the accessibility of the website for people with various impairments. It allows users to select the accessibility features they need, and then browse the content of website. It supports all types of websites and supports over 140 languages. 

ReadWriteMadeSimple plays a crucial role in promoting digital inclusion and ensuring equal access for individual children, students with disabilities in school, college, university, and NGO. Children, students, and faculty with disabilities can access online learning materials, platforms, and digital resources, while using assistive technologies (screen reader) to engage with digital content effectively. 

NGOs can offer ReadWriteMadeSimple to elderly individual and other community members including those with visual, auditory, motor, or cognitive & learning, seizure & epileptic, and ADHD impairments. 

Skynet Technologies is an ISO 9001:2015 & ISO 27001:2013 certified and complies with GDPR, COPPA regulations. They are a member of W3C and International Association of Accessibility Professionals (IAAP). They follow the best industry practices and standards. 

ReadWriteMadeSimple(Free Version): 

- Skip Links  
     - Skip to Menu  
     - Skip to Content  
     - Skip to Footer   
- Reading Mask  
- Content Scaling   
- Readable Fonts    
- Highlight Links  
- Text Magnifier  
- Adjust Font Size  
- Adjust Line Height  
- Adjust Letter Spacing  
- Align Left  
- Align Right  
- Align Center   
- High Contrast   
- Hide Images 
- Multiple Theme
- Move it position at top/bottom

ReadWriteMadeSimple Settings   
- Toggle of light/dark theme 
- Language [Language dropdown list] 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TIP: Easily toggle the ReadWriteMadeSimple between modes. 

ReadWriteMadeSimple  requires sign in to enable pro accessibility features. Signup | Log In 

There will be four types of users: 

Individual Account - $10/month, $100/year 

Student Account - $5/month, $50/year 

NGO/Company - $500/month up to 100 user and $5000/Year

School/college - $2500/month 

For Enterprise Solution please contact us at hello@skynettechnologies.com. 

If you have any questions, please reach out hello@skynettechnologies.com.
